change_summary.what_changed: The pricing page is no longer available and has been replaced with a 404 error page
specific_changes: No redirect to an alternative page with pricing information

strategic_analysis.business_impact: The removal of the pricing page could impact the company's revenue and customer acquisition
strategic_analysis.strategic_direction: The company may be moving towards a more customized or dynamic pricing model
strategic_analysis.competitive_implications: The removal of pricing information could make it more difficult for competitors to compare prices and services

threats: The removal of pricing information could make it more difficult for customers to compare prices and services, potentially impacting customer acquisition and revenue
key_findings: The removal of the pricing page is a significant change that could impact the company's business model and revenue
The introduction of a 404 error page instead of a redirect to an alternative page with pricing information suggests a deliberate decision to remove pricing information
opportunities: The company may be exploring new pricing strategies or business models that could provide a competitive advantage
recommended_actions: Monitor the company's website and announcements for updates on pricing and business model changes
Analyze the company's competitors to see if they have made similar changes to their pricing strategies or business models
